what i mean by legitimate levels are the levels that come with the 
game. the reason i use the word "legitimate" is because those levels 
came with the game and are presumed to be conquerable by normal 
characters (i.e. without cheating). as player-created level 
difficulty escalates, legitimacy is compromised. for example, level 
390 in the tevfifty set i found utterly impossible to beat, even with 
BLATANT cheating. some of your (dph) levels were also extraordinarily 
difficult to beat without cheating for a certain team (elf and 
cleric). i have taken many teams through the "legitimate" (first 
fifty levels) and never felt the slightest inclination to cheat.

THAT'S what i mean by legitimate.. no offense meant

Oldschool

p.s. later on i did cheat because it's fun :)
